.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkSparseImageOpaqueMemoryBindInfo-image-parameter]] pname:image must: be a valid sname:VkImage handle
* [[VUID-VkSparseImageOpaqueMemoryBindInfo-pBinds-parameter]] pname:pBinds must: be a valid pointer to an array of pname:bindCount valid sname:VkSparseMemoryBind structures
* [[VUID-VkSparseImageOpaqueMemoryBindInfo-bindCount-arraylength]] pname:bindCount must: be greater than `0`
****
